description: Modification to railings at 360 and 362.  Reinstatement of entrance bridge and front door at 362 as new entrance to office unit.  Installation of steel stair in front basement area of 360.  Alterations to layouts of all three properties at ground, 1st, 2nd and 3rd floors in connection with conversion to form a 3-bedroom maisonette in the 1st, 2nd and 3rd floors of 360 City Road, a 2-bedroom lateral flat on each of the combined 1st, 2nd and 3rd floors of 362 and 364 City Road and a studio flat in the ground floor of 364.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  The applicants are advised that the Local Planning Authority would wish to see satisfactory proposals for the reinstatement of original front garden areas and boundaries submitted in conjunction with future applications for reintroduction of residential use in these properties.
